## RangePicker class

RangePicker allows user to select range of dates

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class RangePicker extends BasePicker implements IRangePicker 
```
**Extends:** [BasePicker](./drm-datepickerjs.basepicker.md)

**Implements:** [IRangePicker](./drm-datepickerjs.irangepicker.md)
